queries.query: SELECT COUNT(*) AS MONK_VALUE, ((sysdate - to_date('01-JAN-1970','DD-MON-YYYY')) * (86400)) AS MONK_TIMESTAMP FROM SYSTEM.MON_USERS USERS JOIN SYSTEM.MON_DEPARTMENTS DEPT ON USERS.DEPARTMENT = DEPT.ID WHERE DEPT.name LIKE 'IT'

SELECT COUNT(*) AS MONK_VALUE, ((sysdate - to_date('01-JAN-1970','DD-MON-YYYY')) * (86400)) AS MONK_TIMESTAMP FROM SYSTEM.MON_USERS USERS JOIN SYSTEM.MON_DEPARTMENTS DEPT ON USERS.DEPARTMENT = DEPT.ID WHERE DEPT.name LIKE 'IT'

SELECT COUNT(*) AS MONK_VALUE, ((sysdate - to_date('01-JAN-1970','DD-MON-YYYY')) * (86400)) AS MONK_TIMESTAMP FROM SYSTEM.MON_USERS USERS JOIN SYSTEM.MON_DEPARTMENTS DEPT ON USERS.DEPARTMENT = DEPT.ID WHERE DEPT.name LIKE 'IT'
